prefuse.data.column
Class LongColumn

java.lang.Object
  prefuse.data.column.AbstractColumn
      prefuse.data.column.LongColumn
All Implemented Interfaces:
Column
public class LongColumn
extends AbstractColumn

Column implementation for storing long values.

Author:
jeffrey heer
